mapper.select: SELECT utheircomm.*,role.`discount`,`user`.`username`,commodity.* FROM `utheircomm`,`user`,role,commodity WHERE utheircomm.`userid` = `user`.`userid` AND `user`.`roleid`=role.`roleid` AND utheircomm.`commodityid`=commodity.`commodityid` AND commodity.commodityid=#{commodityid} AND user.userid=#{userid}
